title: The Control of working capital (NP)
brief_description: Designed to explain the essentials of business finance to people without any financial background. Uses a dramatic format to explain how a cash crisis can be avoided by reducing working capital in four key areas: purchasing, manufacturing, sales, and credit control. Starring John Cleese and Ronnie Corbett and written by Antony Jay (of “Yes Prime Minister” fame). Suitable for upper secondary level.
